content.text: 使用指定的名称、值和可选配置设置cookie。Sets a cookie with specified name, value, and optional configuration

```ts
// Set cookie with custom expiration
setCookie('session_token', 'abc123', 'h2'); // Expires in 2 hours
setCookie('remember_me', 'true', 'd30');    // Expires in 30 days
setCookie('temp_data', 'value', 's300');    // Expires in 5 minutes
```
Consider using modern storage APIs or server-side sessions for sensitive data

summary.text: Cookie名称（不应包含特殊字符）。Cookie name (should not contain special characters)

text.comment: Cookie名称（不应包含特殊字符）。Cookie name (should not contain special characters)

summary.text: Cookie值（如需要将进行URL编码）。Cookie value (will be URL encoded if needed)

text.comment: Cookie值（如需要将进行URL编码）。Cookie value (will be URL encoded if needed)

summary.text: 过期时间：'s20'（20秒），'h12'（12小时），'d30'（30天）。默认：1天。Expiration time: 's20' (20 sec), 'h12' (12 hours), 'd30' (30 days). Default: 1 day
Cookie域（例如，'.example.com'用于子域访问）。Cookie domain (e.g., '.example.com' for subdomain access)

text.comment: Cookie域（例如，'.example.com'用于子域访问）。Cookie domain (e.g., '.example.com' for subdomain access)

summary.text: Cookie路径（默认为根路径）。Cookie path (defaults to root path)

text.comment: Cookie路径（默认为根路径）。Cookie path (defaults to root path)

Function:

setCookie

Description:

使用指定的名称、值和可选配置设置cookie。Sets a cookie with specified name, value, and optional configuration

Returns:
Example:
// Set basic cookie (expires in 1 day)
setCookie('username', 'john_doe');
Example:
// Set cookie with custom expiration
setCookie('session_token', 'abc123', 'h2'); // Expires in 2 hours
setCookie('remember_me', 'true', 'd30');    // Expires in 30 days
setCookie('temp_data', 'value', 's300');    // Expires in 5 minutes
Example:
// Set cookie for specific domain and path
setCookie('api_key', 'secret123', 'd7', '.example.com', '/api');
Example:
// Set user preferences with proper encoding
const preferences = JSON.stringify({ theme: 'dark', lang: 'en' });
setCookie('user_prefs', encodeURIComponent(preferences), 'd365');
Example:
// Set secure cookie for authentication (consider SameSite and Secure flags)
setCookie('auth_token', token, 'h8', '', '/');
// Note: For production, consider using secure, httpOnly, and sameSite attributes
Since:

1.0.0

See:
  • getCookie - Retrieve cookie values
  • delCookie - Delete cookies
  • https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Document/cookie - Browser support: All browsers
  • https://web.dev/samesite-cookies-explained/ - SameSite cookie security
  • https://developers.google.com/privacy-sandbox/3pcd - Third-party cookie deprecation timeline
Deprecated:

Consider using modern storage APIs or server-side sessions for sensitive data
